name: GetCartLineItemsInfo
description:
Retrieve information about a cart's line items.

Use this tool to get details about the items in a specific cart within an ecommerce store. It provides insights into products added to a cart.

parameters.name: store_identifier
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the store containing the cart.

parameters.name: cart_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the cart to retrieve line items for.

parameters.description: The number of cart line items to return, from 1 to 1000. Default is 10.
